list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an amount of money or property left to someone in a will.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: my grandmother died and unexpectedly left me a small legacy
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bà tôi đã chết và bất ngờ để lại cho tôi một di sản nhỏ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting or relating to software or hardware that has been superseded but is difficult to replace because of its wide use.
